description: The Meta-class is the mainline freighter of N+S Logistics, boasting incredible cargo capacity, spacious crew areas. It has been through a substantial redesign, aiming to reduce accidents and increase supply throughput. The Meta-class frigate can most often be found in the frontier transporting cargo between outposts, delivering mail, and selling N+S goods and merchandise. N+S is not liable for any health issues, injuries or addictions that may occur while working aboard this vessel.
